title: Contact — THE HEALTHY AMERICAN.org
cleaned_text:
“23 WAYS TO GET HELP & MAKE A DIFFERENCE!”

(1) Download the FREE FACT SHEET about RELIGIOUS EXEMPTIONS click here

(3) Get FREE DOCUMENTS about your rights and the laws that protect them click here

(5) Book a VIP call with PEGGY and PASTOR DAVID click here

(6) Subscribe to the FREE NEWSLETTER click here

(7) Learn How to WIN IN COURT without a Lawyer click here

(8) Take Peggy’s online course about EMPLOYEE RIGHTS click here

(9) Take Peggy’s online course about your MEDICAL RIGHTS click here

(10) Learn how to get your kids out of public school with FREEDOM LEARNING click here

(11) Watch Peggy’s online course about PANIC-FREE PREPPING click here

(12) Watch Peggy’s online course on How to Take on your LOCAL BOARDS click here

(13) Learn about your STATE LAWS that prohibit discrimination click here

(14) How to make a difference and TAKE ACTION click to watch Part 1 Part 2 Part 3

(15) Purchase our T-SHIRTS to spread the word and speak your mind click here

(16) Follow Peggy and THE HEALTHY AMERICAN on these SOCIAL SITES click here

(18) Join us at our LIVE EVENTS, including BEACH CHURCH click here

(20) Join Peggy live Mon-Fri 3 pm Pacific for PEGGY TO THE RESCUE click here

(21) Invite Peggy to SPEAK at your event click here

(22) Print out The Healthy American BUSINESS CARDS and share them with everyone you know: click here

(23) Donate to help us continue this important work click here

Please note this is not legal advice and we are unable to refer attorneys.

Many Healthy Americans have gotten successful outcomes with our help. click to read

We look forward to serving you,
